About Me

Nirajh joined Regent Group in 2010 as Centre Manager of Regent Learning Centre (RLC) Harrow and helped grow the business to its maximum capacity before leaving the organisation in 2014 to follow his passion for recruitment. He worked in a number of organisations, successfully increasing their revenue and achieving his set targets, which included projects in the public sector. Nirajh re-joined Regent Group in 2017 as part of the Business Development & Sales team, predominately concentrating on pre-18 projects across Regent Group campuses. Currently Nirajh works as an Admission Recruitment and Widening Access (ARWA) Officer  for the company, his primary objective is assisting the company to meet its strategic goals.

Key responsibilities

  • Achieve recruitment goals;
  • Manage customer care;
  • Closely work with campus leads on commercial matters.
